client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the actions between the server and the client.
    Author:
    quentin sauvage
    See Also:
    TCPClient, UDPClientBroadcast, JsonReader, JsonWriter
